intro: Stenomeris dioscoreifolia, commonly known as the arrowleaf stenomeris, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its palmate leaves that resemble the shape of an arrowhead. The plant produces small, pale yellow to white flowers arranged in clusters, which bloom during the wet season. Its roots are fibrous and adapted to thrive in moist, well-drained soils. Stenomeris dioscoreifolia is often found in shaded understory environments of tropical forests.
